Package components

Class Van

java.lang.Object
components.Truck
components.Van
All Implemented Interfaces:
Node
public class Van
extends Truck
This class represents a non standard truck that collects and delivers non standard packages (one at a time)
Version:
1.00 7 Apr 2021
Author:
Israel Avihail 308298363, Ofir Golan 315585323
See Also:
Package, Truck

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Van()
    Class constructor that creates a van object
    Van​(java.lang.String licensePlate, java.lang.String truckModel)
    Class constructor that creates a van based on specified characteristics

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void collectPackage​(Package p)
    This method handles the completion of collection of a package from a costumer by the van, the appropriate status of the package is set, a tracking listing is added and the packaged is removed from the van (it is at the branch now)
    void deliverPackage​(Package p)
    This method handles the delivery of a non standard package from the van to a costumer, the appropriate status of the package is set and a tracking listing is added
    java.lang.String getSimpleName()
    This method constructs a string representation of a van
    java.lang.String toString()
    The function returns the string representation of the object.
    void work()
    This method represents work van - if the van is on it's way the time until it gets to the destination is reduced, if the van has reached it's destination the van collects\delivers the package according to the appropriate status of the package

    Methods inherited from class components.Truck

    addPackage, addPackage, addPackages, addPackages, equals, generateLicensePlate, getLastPack, getLicensePlate, getnextId, getPackages, getTimeLeft, getTruckID, getTruckModel, isAvailable, removePackage, removePackage, removePackages, setAvailable, setPackages, setTimeLeft, setTruckID

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Van

      public Van​(java.lang.String licensePlate, java.lang.String truckModel)
      Class constructor that creates a van based on specified characteristics
      Parameters:
      licensePlate - the license plate of the van to be set
      truckModel - the model of the van to be set

  • Method Details

    • work

      public void work()
      This method represents work van - if the van is on it's way the time until it gets to the destination is reduced, if the van has reached it's destination the van collects\delivers the package according to the appropriate status of the package

    • collectPackage

      public void collectPackage​(Package p)
      This method handles the completion of collection of a package from a costumer by the van, the appropriate status of the package is set, a tracking listing is added and the packaged is removed from the van (it is at the branch now)
      Parameters:
      p - - the package that we want to collect

    • deliverPackage

      public void deliverPackage​(Package p)
      This method handles the delivery of a non standard package from the van to a costumer, the appropriate status of the package is set and a tracking listing is added
      Parameters:
      p - - the package that we want to deliver
